item.title: Strengthening the contribution of macroecological models to conservation practice
item.description: Related materials It’s time to strengthen the macroecology–conservation practice interface, Mongabay.com Commentary I wrote an opinion piece on how to strengthen the contribution of #macroecological #models to #conservation practice for the macroecology 30th anniversary series @GEB_macrohttps://t.co/Fcz3b6Aih5 pic.twitter.com/u9PSvYidnF — 𝐆𝐈𝐎 𝐑𝐀𝐏𝐀𝐂𝐂𝐈𝐔𝐎𝐋𝐎 (@giorapac) November 26, 2018 It’s time to strengthen the #macroecology–#conservation practice interface - my commentary geared towards practitioners and the general public now out @mongabay https://t.co/BrgOv8GbKA — 𝐆𝐈𝐎 𝐑𝐀𝐏𝐀𝐂𝐂𝐈𝐔𝐎𝐋𝐎 (@giorapac) November 29, 2018
